explanations.neural network: The paper proposes a linear-variational-inequality primal-dual neural network (LVI-PDNN) and its adaptive fuzzy-power version (F-LVI-PDNN) to solve the time-varying minimum-cost portfolio insurance problem, indicating the use of neural networks.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper mentions that the proposed LVI-PDNN is a powerful recurrent neural network, which is explicitly stated in the abstract.
